movies.title: Flight Risk
movies.synopsis: A U.S. Marshal escorts a government witness to trial after he's accused of getting involved with a mob boss, only to discover that the pilot who is transporting them is also a hitman sent to assassinate the informant. After they subdue him, they're forced to fly together after discovering that there are others attempting to eliminate them.

movies.title: Mufasa: The Lion King
movies.synopsis: Two imprisoned men bond over a number of years, finding solace and eventual redemption through acts of common decency.

movies.title: The Dark Knight
movies.synopsis: Batman faces the Joker, a criminal mastermind who seeks to create chaos in Gotham City.

movies.title: Avatar
movies.synopsis: A marine on an alien planet finds himself torn between following orders and protecting the world he feels is his home.

movies.title: The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King
movies.synopsis: Gandalf and Aragorn lead the World of Men against Sauron's army, while Frodo and Sam continue their quest to destroy the One Ring.

movies.title: 12 Angry Men
movies.synopsis: A jury of twelve men must decide the fate of a young man accused of murder, and the deliberation forces them to confront their own prejudices.

movies.title: Schindler's List
movies.synopsis: In Poland during World War II, Oskar Schindler gradually becomes concerned for his Jewish workers after witnessing their persecution by the Nazis.

movies.title: The Good, the Bad and the Ugly
movies.synopsis: In the American Civil War, a bounty hunting scam joins three men in an uneasy alliance. As they try to find a fortune in gold, they must face their changing partnership.

movies.title: Forrest Gump
movies.synopsis: The life and loves of a man who witnesses some of the most momentous events in the 20th century.

tvShows.title: Breaking Bad
tvShows.synopsis: A high school chemistry teacher turned methamphetamine kingpin partners with a former student to secure his family's future.

tvShows.title: Game of Thrones
tvShows.synopsis: Noble families fight for control over the Seven Kingdoms of Westeros while an ancient enemy returns.

tvShows.title: Stranger Things
tvShows.synopsis: A group of kids in the 1980s uncover secret government experiments and supernatural creatures in their small town.

tvShows.title: Reacher
tvShows.synopsis: Jack Reacher, a veteran military police investigator, has just recently entered civilian life. Reacher is a drifter, carrying no phone and the barest of essentials as he travels the country and explores the nation he once served..

tvShows.title: The Rookie
tvShows.synopsis: Starting over isn't easy, especially for small-town guy John Nolan who, after a life-altering incident, is pursuing his dream of being an LAPD officer. As the force's oldest rookie, he's met with skepticism from some higher-ups who see him as just a walking midlife crisis.

tvShows.title: Squid Game
tvShows.synopsis: Hundreds of cash-strapped players accept a strange invitation to compete in children's games. Inside, a tempting prize awaits â€” with deadly high stakes.
